title: Beautiful, but missing something... - Beyerdynamic Xelento Wireless
description: Get a dbrand skin or grip for your devices today at   Audio expert Dan is here with the help of Labs to find out if Beyerdynamic's new Xelento Wireless earbuds live up to the hefty price tag with superb audio quality, or if they're just a fashion piece for the wealthy.  Buy a pair of Beyerdynamic Xelento Wireless Headphones:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Dan's in love 0:41 Unboxing 2:09 Design impressions 4:05 Sponsor - dbrand 4:23 Setup and app 6:08 Listening impressions 7:10 Testing results from Labs 8:34 Listening with adjusted EQs and additional thoughts 11:33 Overall thoughts 12:17 Outro
